title: Promos glitch
body: I was just in my promos and I won my first game, then played my second which was a loss. I was really hyped to play my 3rd game which would decide it all and Won it thankfully, But for some reason it didnt do anything. I got no upgrade, PLS HELP

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and don't see anything terribly off. It looks like you won the first, then lost the next 2 matches, resulting in no promotion for this series.

If you have any other questions or have any other info for me, let me know.
